Champion Select[]

Pick
  • ▶️   Sound Effect
  • ▶️   "Quest accepted! ...Wait, where are we going?"
Ban
  • ▶️   "Hey, your loss. But I get it."
  • Classic
  • Pulsefire
  • Battle Academia
  • Porcelain Protector

Original
Arcade
Star Guardian
Pajama Guardian
Each of these skins may feature: a voiceover filter; additional quotes and/or interactions. In all other cases, skins use the base skin's audio or version of the audio. Some voicelines may also be disabled while using alternate skins.

Game Start[]

Music upon start of the game
  • ▶️   A stripped-down version of "A New Horizon" plays, which then switches to "Burning Bright".

Movement[]

First Move[]

  • ▶️   *sighs* "I don't care where here is. Just point me toward adventure."
  • ▶️   "Yeah, yeah, yeah. World. Peril. Save it. I got it, I got it."
  • ▶️   "Huh, could've sworn there was a hidden entrance around here somewhere..."
  • ▶️   "Where there's treasure, there's glory. And where there's glory... girls are watching."
  • ▶️   "Stick with me and you'll be fine. That's not a guarantee, by the way."
  • ▶️   "Oh, please don't die. I can't lose a sidekick. Not again."
  • ▶️   "Hey. We can do this! Well, I can do this. You, 50/50."
  • ▶️   "To save video games, he had to become video games. Ezreal is... video games."
  • ▶️   ♫ "Burning Bright! Nah-nah-nah-nah Nah-nah-nah-something." ♫

Long Move[]

15 seconds cooldown, 2000 units
  • ▶️   "Never met a problem I couldn't blast away with magic... that I don't even understand."
  • ▶️   "I use a fake name in Demacia: Jarro Lightfeather. Sentinel of Light, 8th Order. He's a national hero."
  • ▶️   "It's not grave-robbing if you have a college degree. Which I do... *cough* not have a college degree."
  • ▶️   "Yeah, we'll liberate a priceless artifact or two. Kill some bad guys. Maybe save the world. Y'know, typical hero stuff. It'll be great."
  • ▶️   "I unearth the secrets of the past and sell them to the highest bidder. Does that make me a criminal? ...Don't answer that."
  • ▶️   "Some people call me a hero. Their word, not mine. But it does have a nice ring to it."
  • ▶️   "I don't read books about the world. I go out there and see it for myself."
  • ▶️   "Nothing stops me. Except for Shuriman parasites. It was... not pretty."
  • ▶️   "Little piece of advice: If no one tells you something's impossible, then it's still possible. So go do it."
  • ▶️   "Last time I was in Shurima, I decoded some glyphs. Something about a... jackal head, end of times... the usual. I just wanted this ruby scarab. It looked great on my mantle."
  • ▶️   "They really hate me in Shurima. And in Noxus. Demacia's lukewarm on me. Haven't been to Ionia yet, seems nice."
  • ▶️   "I can't get hauled into wizard court again. Technically I don't have a permit for the gauntlet."
  • ▶️   "Uh, I hold the speed-running record for Hyper Crystal Dungeon. This is nothing."
  • ▶️   "I don't want to brag, but I'm somewhat of a cosmic sensation."
  • ▶️   "Hmm, maybe I'll ask the First Star for a tuxedo... and some roses."

  • ▶️   "You belong in a museum!"

Joke[]

Ezreal tries to balance an artifact on his index finger, but drops it and barely manages to catch it.
  • ▶️   "Ah. Watch this... We will never speak of this again. Ever."
Joke Response

  • ▶️   "This is no time for jokes. Your jokes. My jokes are great."

Kills and Objectives[]

Killing a Champion
  • ▶️   "Name's Ezreal. E-Z-... oh, you're dead."
  • ▶️   "And Ezreal is victorious! Ahhh! Yeah!"
  • ▶️   "Take five, everyone. I got this."
  • ▶️   "And now, you're cosmic dust!"
Scoring a Pentakill
  • ▶️   "No applause, please! ...Okay, maybe just a bit of thunderous acclaim! ...A little?"
  • ▶️   "Wow. That escalated quickly!"
  • ▶️   "Good job, everyone. Let's, uh... just keep doing whatever you were doing."
Destroying a Turret
  • ▶️   "Cool guys never look back at explosions."
  • ▶️   "Oooh, I hope that wasn't a world heritage site."
  • ▶️   "I'll come back later and sift through the rubble for artifacts."
  • ▶️   "Everyone see that? No? Damn! Now I've got to go and do it again!"
  • ▶️   "They just don't make temple traps like they used to."
Killing Baron Nashor
  • ▶️   "Never act like victory is assured. Even though it probably is."

Shopping[]

50% chance

10 seconds cooldown
  • ▶️   "We mages call this a warlock exit."

Recall Music
  • ▶️   Ezreal one-shots a pixel dragon and jubilates the victory.
  • ▶️   A shortened version of "A New Horizon" plays.

  • ▶️   Ezreal groans.

Trivia[]

Ezreal, the Prodigal Explorer
  • ▶️  "'Know your environment'. My environment... is wet and muddy and probably filled with leeches." references his old line ▶️  "Know your environment."
  • ▶️  "Yordles, why'd it have to be Yordles?" references Raiders of the Lost Ark ("Snakes, why did it have to be snakes?").
  • ▶️   "Noxians. I hate these guys.", ▶️  "That belongs in a museum. ...All of this belongs in a museum... I won't say anything.", and ▶️   "You belong in a museum!", all reference Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade ("This belongs in a museum. - So do you." ; "Nazis... I hate these guys...").
  • ▶️  "No luck, all skill." references his skillshot abilities.
  • ▶️  "Reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated." resembles a quote by the author Mark Twain, as well as a quote by Metro Man from Megamind.
  • ▶️  "Gauntlet! You're embarrassing me in front of the bad guys!" references Avengers: Infinity War ("Dude, you're embarrassing me in front of the wizards.").
  • ▶️  "Wow. That escalated quickly!" quotes Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy ("That escalated quickly.")
  • ▶️  "Aim for the legs..." references a Reddit post about Ezreal kissing Shyvana's leg.[1]
  • Ezreal shares quotes with:
    • ▶️   ▶️   "Yordles, why'd it have to be Yordles?"
Ezreal (old)
  • ▶️  "You belong in a museum!" and ▶️  "Noxians... I hate those guys... " reference Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade ("This belongs in a museum. - So do you." ; "Nazis... I hate these guys...").
    • A side-by-side comparison can be seen here.
  • ▶️  "It's all skill" might be referencing Mystic Shot, Essence Flux, and Trueshot Barrage being skillshots.
  • His taunt (flipping a coin and shooting at it) references Western movies.
  • While on the PBE, his joke was "My age exceeds your IQ... significantly" and his taunt "Just the thought of killing you is likely to cause it".
Pulsefire Ezreal
  • ▶️  "Hey, what's the scanner say about their power level?" references the meme-status phrase It's Over 9000! from Dragon Ball Z.
    • A side-by-side comparison can be seen here.
      • Kyle Hebert (Ezreal's pre-rework voice actor) also coincidentally voiced the narrator Gohan, and others in Dragon Ball Z.
  • ▶️  "When you've got this much skill, every shot's a lucky one." references ▶️   "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot."
  • ▶️  "Grim dark future huh? Too easy!" references Warhammer 40K ("In the grim darkness of a far future, there is only war").
  • ▶️  PEARL: "Leaving the grid" references Tron.
  • ▶️  "Now this is research!" plays on a quote from Star Wars: Episode I – The Phantom Menace ("Now this is Pod-racing!").
  • ▶️  "Well, you found me. Congratulations." quotes GLaDOS from Portal.
  • ▶️  "Museum? This belongs in my pocket." references his taunt ▶️   "You belong in a museum!".
  • ▶️  "Back to the future with you!", ▶️  "Back... to the future!", and ▶️  "Where the hoverboards?" reference Back to the Future.
  • ▶️  "There can be only one." quotes Highlander.
  • ▶️  "Paradoxes, I hate those guys." references ▶️   "Noxians, I hate those guys."
  • ▶️  PEARL: "It seems the cake is in another timeline." references Portal and Super Mario Bros.
  • ▶️  "If I'm not back in 30 seconds, wait longer." references Ace Ventura ("If I'm not back in five minutes... just wait longer.").
  • ▶️  "You lost today, kid.", ▶️  "Everybody's lost but me." and ▶️  "Time for a little fortune and glory." reference Indiana Jones ("You lost today, Kid, but that doesn't mean you have to like it" ; "Everybody's lost but me." ; "Fortune and glory, kid. Fortune and glory.").
  • ▶️  "Never tell me the odds!" quotes Han Solo in The Empire Strikes Back.
  • In the Brazilian localization, "I have all the time I need." was translated as Ezreal singing "Tenho todo o tempo do mundo." ("I have all the time in the world") like the popular song Tempo Perdido.
Battle Academia Ezreal
  • His voice lines generally seem to be a parody of Deku from My Hero Academia.
Porcelain Protector Ezreal
  • ▶️  "To do good, you've gotta be good." is similar to ▶️  "If you look dangerous, you better be dangerous."
  • ▶️  "Magic tiger doesn't like you. I don't like you either." references the cantina scene from Star Wars: A New Hope.
  • ▶️  "Don't talk to me or my tiger spirit ever again." references a widely-used meme. ("Don't talk to me or my son ever again.")
